languages.text: "Я отправлю наименее ценных людей на вход. Они примут первый удар и проредят число врагов". {n}Автоматическим движением проверив, насколько легко пистолет покидает кобуру, Владайм... улыбается. Улыбается легко, молодо и кровожадно.{/n} "Я почти забыл, как я это все люблю".

"I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."
languages.original_text: "Я отправлю наименее ценных людей на вход. Они примут первый удар и проредят число врагов". {n}Автоматическим движением проверив, насколько легко пистолет покидает кобуру, Владайм... улыбается. Улыбается легко, молодо и кровожадно.{/n} "Я почти забыл, как я это все люблю".

traits.locale_text: {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easygoing, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I was beginning to forget how much I love this."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: “我打算把我最不重要的助手派到入口那里，应对最初的攻击，这应该可以减少一部分客人的数量。”{n}弗拉迪姆不假思索地伸手拔枪，看看枪能不能轻易地从枪套里取出来。随后……他微笑起来，那是年轻、随和而嗜血的笑容。{/n}“我都快忘了我有多喜欢这一切了。”
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."

traits.locale_text: “我打算把我最不重要的助手派到入口那里，应对最初的攻击，这应该可以减少一部分客人的数量。”{n}弗拉迪姆不假思索地伸手拔枪，看看枪能不能轻易地从枪套里取出来。随后……他微笑起来，那是年轻、随和而嗜血的笑容。{/n}“我都快忘了我有多喜欢这一切了。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: 「最も無価値な部下を入り口へ向かわせ、最初の攻撃の矢面に立たせる。それで客人の数をヘラせるだろう」{n}ヴラダイムは考えることなくピストルに手を伸ばし、ホルスターからすぐに取り出せるか確認した。そして…微笑んだ。その様子は気楽で、若く、血に飢えていた。{/n}「この仕事がどれほど好きか、忘れかけていたよ」
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."

traits.locale_text: 「最も無価値な部下を入り口へ向かわせ、最初の攻撃の矢面に立たせる。それで客人の数をヘラせるだろう」{n}ヴラダイムは考えることなくピストルに手を伸ばし、ホルスターからすぐに取り出せるか確認した。そして…微笑んだ。その様子は気楽で、若く、血に飢えていた。{/n}「この仕事がどれほど好きか、忘れかけていたよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: «Enviaré a mis socios menos esenciales a la entrada para que absorban la mayor parte del asalto inicial. Eso reducirá los efectivos de nuestros visitantes». {n}Sin pensarlo, Vladaym se lleva la mano a la pistola para comprobar que puede desenfundar fácilmente. Entonces... sonríe. Es una sonrisa afable, joven y sanguinaria.{/n} «Casi había olvidado lo mucho que me gusta todo esto».
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."

traits.locale_text: «Enviaré a mis socios menos esenciales a la entrada para que absorban la mayor parte del asalto inicial. Eso reducirá los efectivos de nuestros visitantes». {n}Sin pensarlo, Vladaym se lleva la mano a la pistola para comprobar que puede desenfundar fácilmente. Entonces... sonríe. Es una sonrisa afable, joven y sanguinaria.{/n} «Casi había olvidado lo mucho que me gusta todo esto».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich werde meine entbehrlichste Getreuen zum Eingang schicken, um die Wucht des ersten Ansturms zu brechen. Das sollte die Reihen unserer Gäste ein wenig lichten." {n}Ohne nachzudenken, greift Vladaym nach seiner Pistole, um zu überprüfen, wie leicht sie sich aus dem Halfter ziehen lässt. Dann ... lächelt er. Es ist ein unbekümmertes, junges und blutrünstiges Lächeln.{/n} "Ich hätte beinahe vergessen, wie sehr ich das alles liebe."
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ohne nachzudenken greift Vladaym nach seiner Pistole, um zu überprüfen, wie leicht sie sich aus dem Halfter ziehen lässt. Dann ... lächelt er. Es ist ein leichtes, junges, blutrünstiges Lächeln.{/n} "Ich hatte schon fast vergessen, wie sehr ich das liebe."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: « J'enverrai mes associés les moins importants à l'entrée pour encaisser le plus gros de l'assaut initial. Ça devrait déjà réduire le nombre de nos invités. » {n}Sans réfléchir, Vladaym saisit son pistolet pour vérifier qu'il sort facilement de son étui, puis... un sourire détendu, jeune et carnassier s'affiche sur son visage.{/n} « J'avais presque oublié combien j'aime ça. »
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."

traits.locale_text: « J'enverrai mes associés les moins importants à l'entrée pour encaisser le plus gros de l'assaut initial. Ça devrait déjà réduire le nombre de nos invités. » {n}Sans réfléchir, Vladaym saisit son pistolet pour vérifier qu'il sort facilement de son étui, puis... un sourire détendu, jeune et carnassier s'affiche sur son visage.{/n} « J'avais presque oublié combien j'aime ça. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Vladaym_Ch04

languages.text: "İlk taarruzu göğüslemeleri için dostlarımdan en ehemmiyetsiz olanları giriş tarafına göndereceğim. Böylece misafirlerimizin sayısı azalacaktır." {n}Vladaym hiç düşünmeden tabancasına uzanıp kılıfından ne kolaylıkla çıktığını sınıyor. Sonra da... gülümsüyor. Rahat, genç ve kana susamış bir tavırla.{/n} "Az kalsın şu işi ne kadar sevdiğimi unutacakmışım."
languages.original_text: "I will send my least important associates to the entrance to take the brunt of the initial assault. That should thin our guests' numbers." {n}Without thinking, Vladaym reaches for his pistol to check how easily it slides out of its holster. Then... he smiles. It's an easy-going, young, and bloodthirsty smile.{/n} "I'd almost forgotten how much I love all this."
